simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will compute the cyclic redundancy check (CRC) value of data in a file

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: The computation starts from the current location of the file pointer to the end of file

parameterdescription.para: The open file handle of the file to scan
Where to store the computed CRC.
One of the enumerated CRC types supported by the CFE_ES_CalculateCRC function
The computed CRC. Only updated if the return value is OS_SUCCESS

entry.para: The return code from OS_read if an error occured

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will scan a filename string for invalid characters

parameterdescription.para: The file name string to scan

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the file name is valid
Returns FALSE if an invalid character was found

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will resolve a symbol name and optional address offset to an absolute address

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If the symbol name is a NUL (empty) string, then the offset becomes the absolute address

parameterdescription.para: A CFS_SymAddr_t pointer that holds the symbol name and optional offset
A pointer to the location to store the resolved address in
The fully resolved address. Only valid if the return value is TRUE

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the resolution was successful
Returns FALSE if the resolution was not successful

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will check an address and data size argument pair for correct 32 bit alignment

parameterdescription.para: The address to check for proper alignment
The size in bytes to check for proper alignment

entry.para: Returns TRUE if both Address and Size are 32 bit aligned
Returns FALSE if either Address or Size is not 32 bit aligned

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will check an address and data size argument pair for correct 16 bit alignment

parameterdescription.para: The address to check for proper alignment
The size in bytes to check for proper alignment

entry.para: Returns TRUE if both Address and Size are 16 bit aligned
Returns FALSE if either Address or Size is not 16 bit aligned

memberdef.argsstring: (CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr, uint16 FilterType, uint16 Algorithm_N, uint16 Algorithm_X, uint16 Algorithm_O)
memberdef.name: CFS_IsPacketFiltered

briefdescription.para: Determine whether Software Bus message packet is filtered.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will apply the CFS filter algorithm to the packet to determine whether the packet should be filtered. This same algorithm may be used by multiple applications (DS, TO, etc.)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Software Bus message packet
Algorithm parameter X "out of this many"

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the packet should be filtered (not used)
Returns FALSE if the packet should not be filtered (used)

memberdef.argsstring: (char *Buffer, int32 BufferSize, boolean StringIsRequired, boolean NeedCharTest)
memberdef.name: CFS_VerifyString
